Articles.Content:
Hi, this is my game when you launch it:

![9oUeiBK.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9oUeiBK.jpg)

My desktop resolution is 2880x1800, and game is set to 1920x1200 and Fullscreen. But when I launch it, this the situation happens in image above. So it's quite small rather than 1920x1200 and windowed. 

At the same time, after game launch, it gets not responding. After waiting 2 or 3 minutes, Squad logo appears and game starting to normally load parts. But at the end of the loading, nothing happens. The writing above loading bar changes(recruiting Kerbals etc.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)), and changes but nothing happens like I said. I'm using unmodded gamedata folder.

Note: Steam verifies game 100%.
Hi TYRT, please see the support stickies and provide your game logs, settings.cfg and dxdiag ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Hi TYRT, please see the support stickies and provide your game logs, settings.cfg and dxdiag ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I searched sticky threads but couldn't find anything. Here is my;

settings.cfg: [http://pastebin.com/GFcMzciZ](http://pastebin.com/GFcMzciZ)

DxDiag: [http://pastebin.com/wFCmQW7m:](http://pastebin.com/wFCmQW7m:)

output\_log(had to divide it):

part 1: [http://pastebin.com/S8KhFD1K](http://pastebin.com/S8KhFD1K)

part 2: [http://pastebin.com/GTVyTmdu](http://pastebin.com/GTVyTmdu)

BTW It says something about my **old** mods, I deleted them. I don't why my log is not up-to-date.
